landing-text: Affordable, comfortable rooms, a splendid meal and a delightful cup of coffee
location-hint: We are right by the European Road 6
rooms-information: We have 8 rooms availables. Breakfast is inkluded in the price.

traditional.desc: We are proud to be able to serve Traditional Norwegian Cookings in a variety of dishes.
traditional.name: Traditional Cookings

pizza.desc: We *might* have the best pizza in Norway.
pizza.name: Pizza

meat.desc: We have a good amount of meat based dishes. Both traditional dishes as well as more modern.
meat.name: Meat, burgers and kebabs

child.desc: We have a decent menu for the smallest.
child.name: Childrens Menu

night.title: Conserts, pub and Nightclub
night.sub: It's important to have som fun.
night.desc: Huset Cafe often organizes evenings with fine music. This can be typical restaurant/nightclub evening with dancing and servings from the bar, but also small intimate concerts where we mainly want to present some of the wonderful artists we have in our vicinity

sushi.title: Sush evening
sushi.desc: People are becoming more and more interested in food, which is why we try to offer various events where food is the main focus. Examples are Sushi evenings, game night, gourmet/taste evenings, steak evening and so on. We also take requests.

private.title: Private arrangementer
private.sub: We are happy to arrange your event
private.desc: We really appreciate being able to organize your day, whether it's a day for cheerful gatherings or something else. We have experiences with birthday anniversaries, birthdays, weddings, funerals, confirmations, reunions and so on.

map1: Huset Cafe & Motell is a roadside restaurant and motell right by E6 through
map2: We aim to serve passing through trafic and tourists as well as beeing an importan public house for our locals.
map3: We will allways strive to have a competetive price level on our services.
catering-text: Cold buffets, warm buffets, sandwiches or anythin else you might wish
